title: So, As a bronze player, I'm always looking for Tips or Guides on Youtube..
body:
But i need a bit of help gathering rather or not certain Channels/Videos are accurate. 

###### i am, However, trying to avoid those Tip junkeys like RedMercy or Brofresco

My current few i'm questioning are

[Gbay99](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRIxFJ5UicWOUdoUYyJTD1Q)

[Arkadian from Scurb](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4JinIRLANIxLzOebfnooaA)

Now, ofcoarse, I'll also ask whether or not anyone here has any Tips/help Vids from youtube/Twitch (As much as i hate to admit it, I only dont use twitch because i just dont know anyone there) and any other things...
